text: Transport Infrastructure Ireland () is a state agency in Ireland dealing with road and public transport infrastructure. The body was established in 2015 by merging the former National Roads Authority and Railway Procurement Agency. == External links == * Transport Infrastructure Ireland website Category:Transport organisations based in Ireland Category:Rail transport in the Republic of Ireland Category:Tram transport in the Republic of Ireland Category:Road transport in the Republic of Ireland Category:Road authorities Category:State-sponsored bodies of the Republic of Ireland Category:2015 establishments in Ireland
title: Transport Infrastructure Ireland
